span.span: Scales and rotates a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅支持正交转换，如90°增量和缩放转换的旋转变换。 supports only orthogonal transforms such as rotation transforms of 90° increments and scale transforms. 不支持扭曲图像的转换。Transforms that skew the image are not supported. 实现 接口，以优化多个属性的初始化。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 只能在对象初始化过程中进行属性更改。Property changes can only occur during object initialization. 调用 以发送初始化已开始的信号，并 通知初始化已完成。Call to signal that initialization has begun and to signal that initialization has completed. 初始化后，属性更改将被忽略。After initialization, property changes are ignored. 使用构造函数创建的对象 将自动初始化并忽略属性更改。 objects created using the constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored. 如果在应用转换后将图像保存到文件，则必须更新与图像数据相关的元数据标记。Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
